name: streammate-server
description: Backend server for Streammate - a show matching application

scripts.dev: PORT=3001 CLIENT_URL=http://localhost:8083 NODE_ENV=development TMDB_API_KEY=af8dc7b506665ef8c1835358ad1ff1ff tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.build: echo 'Starting build process...' && tsc && echo 'Verifying build...' && if [ ! -d 'dist' ]; then echo 'Build failed: dist directory not created' && exit 1; fi && if [ ! -f 'dist/index.js' ]; then echo 'Build failed: index.js not found in dist' && exit 1; fi && echo 'Build successful'
scripts.start: if [ ! -d 'dist' ]; then echo 'Running build first...' && npm run build; fi && echo 'Starting server...' && node dist/index.js
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning dist directory...' && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist
